title: Rs. 66.17 billion disbursed among flood-hit families: Shazia Marri
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 19 (APP):Federal Minister for Poverty Alleviation and Special Safety Shazia Marri on Wednesday revealed that the flood cash relief assistance has been disbursed among 2,646,000 families so far.
A total of Rs.66.17 billion rupees has been distributed to the affected families across the country through the Benazir Income Support Program (BISP), the minister said in a statement.
On Wednesday, 5,000 families were given assistance of Rs 25,000 under the Prime Ministerâ€™s Flood Cash Relief Assistance.
She said that transparency is being ensured in the disbursement of funds under the BISP.
